data.name: NoCompatibleDevicesAfterRanking
data.value: The process of ranking devices removed all compatible devices.

data.name: InactiveSleepTimeCannotBeZero
data.value: The inactive sleep time must be greater than or equal to zero. Specify zero or a positive value.

data.name: NullOrEmptyScreenDeviceName
data.value: The screen device name must be a non-empty, non-null string.

data.name: DefaultTitleName
data.value: Game

data.name: ServiceMustBeAssignable
data.value: Service provider object of type {0} must be assignable to service type {1}.

data.name: ValidateSwapEffectInvalid
data.value: SwapEffect must be one of the following: SwapEffect.Copy, SwapEffect.Discard, or SwapEffect.Flip.

data.name: ValidateMultiSampleQualityInvalid
data.value: The selected MultiSampleQualityLevel value is invalid for the selected MultiSampleType.

data.name: ValidateDepthStencilFormatIsInvalid
data.value: DepthStencilFormat must be one of the following: Depth32, Depth15Stencil1, Depth24Stencil8, Depth24, Depth24Stencil4, Depth16, or Depth24Stencil8Single.

data.name: NoPixelShader11OrDDI9Support
data.value: Could not find a Direct3D device that has a Direct3D 9 level driver and supports pixel shader 1.1 or greater.

data.name: NoDirect3DAccelerationRemoteDesktop
data.value: Direct3D is not available when you are using Remote Desktop.

data.name: InvalidScreenDeviceName
data.value: The device name is not valid. Device names are in the form \\.\\DEVICE1

data.name: NoAudioHardware
data.value: Could not find a suitable audio device. Verify that a sound card is installed, and check the driver properties to make sure it is not disabled.

data.name: NoCompatibleDevices
data.value: Could not find a Direct3D device that supports the requested features.

data.name: InvalidVertexShaderProfile
data.value: Value must be a valid vertex shader profile.

data.name: ValidateRefreshRateInFullScreen
data.value: When IsFullScreen is true, FullScreenRefreshRateInHz must be non-zero.

data.name: ValidateBackBufferCount
data.value: BackBufferCount must be between 0 and 3.

data.name: GraphicsDeviceManagerAlreadyPresent
data.value: A graphics device manager is already registered. The graphics device manager cannot be changed once it is set.

data.name: ServiceAlreadyPresent
data.value: Container already contains a service of this type.

data.name: InvalidPixelShaderProfile
data.value: Value must be a valid pixel shader profile.

data.name: NoSuitableGraphicsDeviceDetails
data.value: This program requires pixel shader {0} and vertex shader {1}.

data.name: Direct3DNotAvailable
data.value: Direct3D 9 is not available. This could be the result of using Remote Desktop or a corrupted DirectX 9 installation.

data.name: GameCannotBeNull
data.value: Game cannot be null.

data.name: BackBufferDimMustBePositive
data.value: BackBufferWidth and BackBufferHeight must be greater than zero.

data.name: PropertyCannotBeCalledBeforeInitialize
data.value: The GraphicsDevice property cannot be used before Initialize has been called.

data.name: ValidateMultiSampleTypeInvalid
data.value: The selected MultiSampleType is not compatible with the current BackBufferFormat and IsFullScreen value for the selected adapter.

data.name: Direct3DInternalDriverError
data.value: The graphics driver returned a low-level error. Please recreate the device or reboot your computer.

data.name: CannotAddSameComponentMultipleTimes
data.value: Cannot add the same game component to a game component collection multiple times.

data.name: NoMultipleRuns
data.value: Cannot call Game.Run multiple times within the same application.

data.name: Direct3DCreateError
data.value: Unable to create the graphics device.

data.name: Direct3DInvalidCreateParameters
data.value: The device creation parameters contain invalid configuration options.

data.name: ValidateRefreshRateInWindow
data.value: When IsFullScreen is false, FullScreenRefreshRateInHz must be zero.

data.name: ValidateBackBufferHzModeFullScreen
data.value: FullScreenRefreshRateInHz does not match a valid display mode with the specified BackBufferWidth and BackBufferHeight.

data.name: ValidateDeviceType
data.value: The selected BackBufferFormat and IsFullScreen value are not valid for the selected adapter format and device type.

data.name: NoSuitableGraphicsDevice
data.value: No suitable graphics card found.

data.name: ValidateAutoDepthStencilFormatInvalid
data.value: The specified DepthStencilFormat is not supported as a depth/stencil format for the selected adapter.

data.name: ValidateBackBufferDimsFullScreen
data.value: When IsFullScreen is true, BackBufferWidth and BackBufferHeight must be non-zero.

data.name: ValidateMultiSampleSwapEffect
data.value: Must use SwapEffect.Discard when enabling multisampling.

data.name: ValidatePresentationIntervalInWindow
data.value: When IsFullScreen is false, PresentationInterval must be one of the following: Default, Immediate, or One.

data.name: GraphicsComponentNotAttachedToGame
data.value: Cannot commit or change device settings if the graphics component has not been added to a game's component list.

data.name: ServiceProviderCannotBeNull
data.value: The service provider instance cannot be null.

data.name: PreviousDrawThrew
data.value: A previous Draw call threw an unhandled exception. See InnerException for details.

data.name: InvalidScreenAdapter
data.value: The adapter does not map to a valid monitor screen.

data.name: TargetElaspedCannotBeZero
data.value: The target elapsed time must be greater than zero. Specify a non-zero positive value.

data.name: ValidatePresentationIntervalIncompatibleInFullScreen
data.value: The selected fullscreen PresentationInterval is not supported by the selected adapter.

data.name: ValidatePresentationIntervalInFullScreen
data.value: When IsFullScreen is true, PresentationInterval must be one of the following: Default, Immediate, One, Two, Three, or Four.

data.name: MissingGraphicsDeviceService
data.value: Drawable components require a graphics device service in the game service container.

data.name: ValidateBackBufferFormatIsInvalid
data.value: BackBufferFormat must be one of the following: Bgr565, Bgr555, Bgra5551, Bgr32, Color, or Bgra1010102.

data.name: ValidateAutoDepthStencilMismatch
data.value: When PresentOptions.DiscardDepthStencil is set, EnabledAutoDepthStencil must be true.

data.name: NoDirect3DAcceleration
data.value: Direct3D hardware acceleration is not available or has been disabled. Verify that a Direct3D enabled graphics device is installed and check the display properties to make sure hardware acceleration is set to Full.

data.name: NoHighResolutionTimer
data.value: Current system does not support a high-resolution counter.

data.name: ServiceTypeCannotBeNull
data.value: The service type cannot be null.

data.name: ValidateBackBufferDimsModeFullScreen
data.value: The BackBufferWidth and BackBufferHeight values do not correspond to a valid display mode.

data.name: NoNullUseDefaultAdapter
data.value: Adapter cannot be null. Try using GraphicsAdapter.DefaultAdapter instead.

data.name: CannotSetItemsIntoGameComponentCollection
data.value: Cannot set a value using operator[] on GameComponentCollection. Use Add/Remove instead.

data.name: ValidateAutoDepthStencilFormatIncompatible
data.value: The specified DepthStencilFormat is not supported as a depth/stencil format when using the selected BackBufferFormat.

data.name: NoGraphicsDeviceService
data.value: This property requires a graphics device service in the game service container.

data.name: ValidatePresentationIntervalOnXbox
data.value: PresentationInterval must be one of the following: Default, Immediate, One, Two, or Three on Xbox 360.

data.name: MustCallBeginDeviceChange
data.value: Must call BeginScreenDeviceChange before calling EndScreenDeviceChange

data.name: ValidateBackBufferCountSwapCopy
data.value: When using SwapEffect.Copy, BackBufferCount must be one.

data.name: ValidateAutoDepthStencilAdapterGroup
data.value: When using multiple PresentationParameters and EnableAutoDepthStencil is true, EnableAutoDepthStencil, AutoDepthStencilFormat, BackBufferFormat, BackBufferWidth, and BackBufferHeight must be the same for all adapters.

data.name: TitleCannotBeNull
data.value: The title name cannot be null. Use an empty string instead.
